seniority_level.evidence: 3+ years experience required, no 'Senior' in title, typical for mid-level data engineer role

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Engineer-Business Intelligence', focus on BI/DW projects and data pipelines

sub_specialty.evidence: Focus on BI/DW projects, ETL tools mentioned (DataStage, Azure Data Factory, Informatica), reporting and visualization emphasis

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of team leadership, mentoring, or direct reports; individual contributor role focused on development and maintenance

primary_cloud.evidence: Multiple clouds mentioned equally as nice-to-have: AWS, Google, Azure with no clear primary preference

secondary_clouds.evidence: All three major cloud providers mentioned as nice-to-have skills

processing_paradigm.evidence: Focus on BI/DW projects, ETL tools for batch processing, reporting and visualization - no streaming mentioned

orchestrator_category.evidence: No specific orchestration tools mentioned in job description

storage_layer.evidence: Focus on BI/DW (data warehouse) projects, reporting and visualization typical of warehouse environments

remote_restriction.evidence: Specific location requirement: Pune, Maharashtra, India with onsite work model

timezone_focus.evidence: Location in Pune, Maharashtra, India indicates APAC timezone focus

relocation_required.evidence: Onsite role in specific location (Pune) implies relocation needed for non-local candidates

h1b_friendly.evidence: Role is in India, H1B (US visa) not applicable; no visa sponsorship mentioned

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visa support or work authorization requirements for India

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship restrictions mentioned, would require work authorization in India

w2_vs_1099.evidence: IBM full-time employee position, no contractor language used, typical W2 employment

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits mentioned in job description, unusual for full-time role

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No career growth, advancement, or development opportunities mentioned

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mentorship program or collaborative environment described

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No promotion or advancement mentioned in job description

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No internal mobility, role changes, or team changes mentioned

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks (IC, management, specialist, architect) mentioned

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between 'Required' and 'Preferred' sections with balanced must-haves vs nice-to-haves

scope_definition.evidence: Focused Data Engineer-Business Intelligence role with well-defined BI/DW, reporting, and visualization responsibilities

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: 3 years experience requirement reasonable for mid-level role, skills appropriate for seniority level
